price: Oo; nakakakaya na bumuo Kami ng mga dulo ng daliri niya.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
